shopping_webcrawler

Class WebCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • shopping_webcrawler.WebCrawler

  • public class WebCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
    WebCrawler crawls web page information from specific website This WebCrawler is focused on "http://www.shopping.com"
    Version:
    1.0 Build Oct 12, 2014
    Author:
    Weizhi Wang
